Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Gun = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local minRange = 2 local maxRange = 700
local damage = 30
local gunSound
ray = Instance.new("Part") ray.FormFactor = 3 ray.Shape = "Ball" ray.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) ray.CanCollide = false ray.Transparency = 0.7
bullet = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") bullet.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=50876274" bullet.TextureId = "" bullet.Parent = ray bullet.Scale = Vector3.new(0.03, 0.03, 0.03)
local vCharacter
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
function shoot(pos, target) vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if vPlayer == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
spawnPos = myTorso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos+ pos.unit * 5.0
rayC = ray:Clone() rayC.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos) rayC.Parent = game.Workspace
bodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") bodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0.0, rayC:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) bodyForce.Parent = rayC
rayC.Velocity = pos.unit * 500.0
hit, destination = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(Gun.Position + pos*minRange, pos*maxRange), vCharacter)
if hit then if hit.Name == "Head" then damage = 100 else damage = 30 end humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then vChar = hit.Parent wait(0.1) tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) newScript = Tool.OnTouchScript:Clone()
if vChar:FindFirstChild("OnTouchScript") == nil then newScript.Parent = vChar newScript:FindFirstChild("Pos").Value = myTorso.Position newScript:FindFirstChild("GunChar").Value = vCharacter newScript.Disabled = false end wait(0.5) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not myTorso then return end
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not myHumanoid then return end
target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint direction = (target - Gun.Position).unit
gunSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("TrigunSound") if gunSound then gunSound:Play() end
shoot(direction, target) wait(1.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if gunSound then gunSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

vChar = script.Parent
r= game:GetService("RunService")
myTorso = vChar:FindFirstChild("Torso")
blastAOE = Vector3.new(7, 7, 7)
gunChar = script:FindFirstChild("GunChar")
if myTorso then print("found Torso") newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.Name = "BlastBV" newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, newBV.P, newBV.P) distance = (myTorso.Position - script.Pos.Value).magnitude print(distance) if distance < 15.0 then newBV.velocity = (myTorso.Position - script.Pos.Value).unit * 50.0 else newBV.velocity = (myTorso.Position - script.Pos.Value).unit * 900.0 * 1/distance end newBV.Parent = myTorso
newBAV = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") newBAV.Name = "BlastBAV" newBAV.P = 100000 math.randomseed(1234) newBAV.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(6, 10), math.random(6, 10), math.random(6, 10)) newBAV.Parent = myTorso
parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(myTorso.Position - blastAOE, myTorso.Position + blastAOE), vChar, 100) for i = 1, #parts do tempChar = parts[i].Parent tempTorso = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tempTorso and tempChar ~= gunChar.Value then bv = tempTorso:FindFirstChild("BlastBV") bav = tempTorso:FindFirstChild("BlastBAV") if not bv and not bav then newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.Name = "BlastBV" newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, newBV.P, newBV.P) if distance < 15.0 then newBV.velocity = (myTorso.Position - script.Pos.Value).unit * 50.0 else newBV.velocity = (myTorso.Position - script.Pos.Value).unit * 900.0 * 1/distance end newBV.Parent = tempTorso
newBAV = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") newBAV.Name = "BlastBAV" newBAV.P = 100000 math.randomseed(4567) newBAV.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(3, 6), math.random(3,6), math.random(3,6)) newBAV.Parent = tempTorso end end end wait(1.5) for i = 1, #parts do BV = parts[i]:FindFirstChild("BlastBV") BAV = parts[i]:FindFirstChild("BlastBAV") if BV then BV:Remove() end if BAV then BAV:Remove() end end bv = myTorso:FindFirstChild("BlastBV") bav = myTorso:FindFirstChild("BlastBAV") if bv then bv:Remove() end if bav then bav:Remove() end end
wait(1.0) script:Remove()
